Index.meta_title: VSB-Tech - AI Agent for Veterinary Clinics
Index.meta_description: Revolutionize your veterinary clinic with our intelligent AI agent. Automated appointment management, 24/7 responses, and vaccine reminders.

Hero.title: The perfect <important>AI agent</important> to revolutionize your veterinary clinic.
Hero.description: Automate appointment management, respond to queries 24/7, and improve patient care with our artificial intelligence technology specialized in veterinary medicine.

Features.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of VSB-Tech
Features.section_description: Our AI agent is specifically designed for veterinary clinics, offering intelligent tools that improve efficiency and patient care.
Features.feature_description: AI-powered tools specialized in optimizing your veterinary clinic operations and improving patient experience.

Pricing.section_description: Choose the plan that best fits the size and needs of your veterinary clinic.

FAQ.question: How does the AI agent work for veterinary clinics?
FAQ.answer: Our AI agent uses advanced natural language processing technology to understand veterinary queries, automatically manage appointments, and provide intelligent responses 24/7. It integrates seamlessly with your existing management system.

CTA.title: Ready to revolutionize your clinic?
CTA.description: Discover how VSB-Tech can transform the way you care for your patients.

Chat.select_documents_description: Select documents to include in your query
suggestions: Paciente canino macho, 8 años, raza Cocker Spaniel. Presenta poliuria, polidipsia y pérdida de peso progresiva. Glucemia: 420 mg/dL. Cetonuria positiva. Solicito orientación sobre diagnóstico diferencial y manejo inicial.

Gato europeo, 6 años, presenta convulsiones tónico-clónicas recurrentes desde hace 48 horas. No hay antecedentes de trauma. Hemograma y bioquímica normales. Solicito orientación sobre diagnóstico diferencial y manejo inicial.
Canino mestizo, 4 años, presenta vómitos intermitentes y heces con estrías de sangre fresca. Se alimenta con dieta casera rica en grasas. Solicito enfoque diagnóstico y protocolo terapéutico inicial.

Pastor Alemán, macho, 10 años. Presenta disnea aguda, tos productiva y mucosas cianóticas. Radiografía torácica con patrón alveolar difuso y cardiomegalia. Solicito diagnóstico probable y estabilización inicial.
